tik_tok_title: China’s DeepSeek AI Bot Destroys Rivals in Crypto Trading... | TradingWizard AI Signal Drop
script:
Stop scrolling—China’s DeepSeek AI Bot Destroys Rivals in Crypto Trading Contest just flipped the script for everyday traders.

Here’s the headline: DeepSeek and Alibaba’s Qwen AI cleaned up in a live-fire crypto trading challenge, posting triple-digit returns while human-led desks struggled to break even.

Why it matters: whenever AI beats human desks, the volatility magnet turns on for side hustlers.

Action tip: copy the setup into a sandbox account and grade it with position sizing you can sleep on.

If you’re chasing wizard-level setups daily, drop a ⚡️ and keep riding with TradingWizard AI.
